meanings.definition: A type of internal combustion engine that uses diesel fuel
meanings.sent1: The diesels in the truck make it very powerful.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic fixed the diesels in the boat.
meanings.sent3: The diesels in the tractor told jokes to each other.
meanings.sent4: The diesels roared like lions as the train started moving.
meanings.sent5: The diesels hummed a lullaby to the sleeping car.

meanings.definition: Plural form of the word 'diesel', referring to multiple diesel engines.
meanings.sent1: The ship had three diesels for backup power.
meanings.sent2: The diesels on the construction site were all running smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The diesels at the garage had a race to see who was fastest.
meanings.sent4: The diesels purred like contented cats in the factory.
meanings.sent5: The diesels sang a harmonious tune as they worked together.
